# Abrupt-Abrupt Simulate Data

The following explains how the data for the abrupt-abrupt simulated data is generated. 

```{r, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
source("SetUpSim1.R")
par(mfrow = c(2,3), mar = c(4.5,2.5,3,.2), las = 1)


ts.plot(x_t[,1])
ts.plot(x_t[,2])
ts.plot(x_t[,3])
ts.plot(x_t[,4])
ts.plot(x_t[,5])

mtext("AR(1), \U03D5 = 0.3 and \U03D5 = -0.5", outer = TRUE, line = -2)

```
